meanings.sent1: The stray dog managed to beflea the entire house with fleas.
meanings.sent2: After camping in the woods, the hikers discovered that the tent was beflea'd with tiny pests.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought it would be funny to beflea the unsuspecting dog during nap time.

meanings.sent5: The old blanket was so dirty that it seemed to beflea anyone who dared to touch it.

meanings.sent1: The persistent salesperson would not stop trying to beflea the busy office workers with his offers.
